metadata.title: CVE-2018-11627 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Sinatra before 2.0.2 has XSS via the 400 Bad Request page that occurs upona params parser exception.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11627` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-sinatra - 1.4.7-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby-sinatra package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-3').
